medical_history.history_of_present_illness: Abdominal pain started approximately 12 hours ago at around 2 PM after eating ice cream, initially vague and mostly periumbilical, migrating to the right lower quadrant (RLQ) by early evening, worsened by movement and relieved by lying still. The patient also experienced nausea with two episodes of non-bloody emesis and one episode of loose stool.
medical_history.past_medical_history: Cholecystectomy, 3 C-sections, incisional hernia repair with abdominoplasty.
